plot: When AI3, a robot with four times the data of a woman, escapes to the mind, General Simon, her creator, hunts her down. Little does he know that through his pursuit, he has embarked on a journey to unlocking the true self.
title: AI3
plot_es: When AI3, a robot with four times the data of a woman, escapes to the mind, General Simon, her creator, hunts her down. Little does he know that through his pursuit, he has embarked on a journey to unlocking the true self.
